data.name: Burstfly
data.description: A modern visually appealing html5 template released by designscrazed. This template is responsive and has brilliantly designed inner page/post to get better pageviews and hits.

data.name: Admin LTE Master
data.description: Admin LTE is a free Bootstrap dashboard theme from almsaeedstudio. It is fully responsive and built on top of Bootstrap 3.

data.name: Blandodyssey
data.description: Simple template for multiple cases. You can use it as personal blog website. Also, you can use it as commercial user support website.

data.name: Delphic
data.description: Delphic is a clean and minimalist HTML template that is convenient to use as an online creative portfolio. And it is totally free!

data.name: Future Imperfect
data.description: Future Imperfect is a HTML5 responsive site template available for desktop, tablet and mobile. It has a side column and a fixed menu at the top and an off-canvas menu.

data.name: Html5up Prologue
data.description: The Prologue Responsive Html5 Template is a one page website design with a nice navigational sidebar. This makes it easy to customize and make your own.
